name: neeqtri
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wne(c0, c1)
-| wne(c0, c2)
-| wb(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wne(c0, c1)
-| wne(c0, c2)
-| wb(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c1))
-| wceq(c2, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wne(c0, c1)
-| wne(c0, c2)
-| wceq(c2, c1)

comment: Substitution of equal classes into an inequality. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-2012.)
